attributes.action: Create Banking Laws which DO NOT allow banks to act unfairly and without control.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the past year we have seen a tremendous rise in the reclaiming of unfair and illegal penalties from banks. An estimated £500M has been repaid without apparantly 1p. being contested at law.

Without control and against Common Law, banking institutions have, without any responsuibility, principles or morals, systematically ripped off the British public for their own greedy benefit.

The Government appears to have allowed and even condoned this.

We therefore call  on the Government to tighten up, to a leakproof point, the regulations controlling our financial institutions, so that this scandalous finacial rape of private citizens monies can never be repeated.

We further petition that the banking institutions guilty of deducting illegal penalties from the public, be forced, at the pain  of massive penalties, to refund to its customers such deductions, together with interest, which have been made over the past 6 years.
